  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83299</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83299</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio wave reflection through the layer of the Earth's atmosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwelle Reflexion durch die Schicht der 
Atmosphäre der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion d'onde radio par la couche de 
l'atmosphère de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão da onda de rádio com a camada da 
atmosfera da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione dell'onda radio con lo strato 
dell'atmosfera della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση ραδιο κυμάτων μέσω του στρώματος της 
γήινης ατμόσφαιρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de la onda de radio con la capa de la 
atmósfera de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the electrically charged layer of the Earth's atmosphere which reflects radio waves with long wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth's atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrically charged layer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die elektrisch belastete 
Schicht der Atmosphäre der Masse, welches Funkwellen mit langen 
Wellenlängen reflektiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la couche 
électriquement chargée de l'atmosphère de la terre ce qui reflète 
les ondes radio avec de longues longueurs d'onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a camada eletricamente 
carregada da atmosfera da terra qual reflete as ondas de rádio com 
wavelengths longos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo strato 
elettricamente caricato dell'atmosfera della terra quale riflette le 
onde radio con le lunghezze d'onda lunghe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ηλεκτρικά χρεωμένο 
στρώμα της γήινης ατμόσφαιρας που απεικονίζει τα ραδιο κύματα με 
τα μακροχρόνια μήκη κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la capa eléctricamente
cargada de la atmósfera de la tierra cuál refleja las ondas de radio
con longitudes de onda largas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmosphäre der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch belastete Schicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'atmosphère de la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couche électriquement chargée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondes radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueurs d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atmosfera da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">camada eletricamente carregada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas de rádio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Atmosfera della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strato elettricamente caricato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezze d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη ατμόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικά χρεωμένο στρώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιο κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκη κύματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atmósfera de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capa eléctricamente cargada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas de radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitudes de onda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
